participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Creative and energetic with a love for performing arts.
participant_1.background: I've been taking ballet lessons behind my parents' backs. I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like. I want to move. My favorite jello is the blue one. I love people with a sense of humor.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and friendly, with a passion for gaming and animals.
participant_2.background: I'm passionate about playing video games and spending time with my dogs. I am not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I would hope they would be supportive. My pets are a constant source of comfort and love. I type one handed. I'm active and enjoy the outdoors, but my schedule can be hectic.

content.text: Hey! It's going good! How about yours?
It's going well so far! I just finished ballet class, and I'm feeling pretty good about it.
Oh, cool! I've always wanted to take ballet lessons, but I've never had the time.
You should try it! It's really fun, and it's a great way to get in shape.
Maybe I will! I've always been pretty active, so I think I'd be good at it.
I'm sure you would! Do you have any other hobbies?
Yeah, I love playing video games and spending time with my dogs.
Nice! I love video games too. What kind of games do you like to play?
I like all kinds of games, but I'm really into RPGs right now.
Me too! I just started playing The Witcher 3, and I'm really enjoying it.
I've heard good things about that game. I might have to check it out.
